id: T-Mobile Reports Surge in New Customers
paragraph: November 17, 2018 T-Mobile US Inc. signed up more customers to its flagship brand during the third quarter, outpacing rivals as the carrier continues its pursuit of a merger with Sprint Corp.T-Mobile ended the period with 774,000 more postpaid phone customers, a valuable category because billable subscribers tend to be more profitable. Verizon Communications Inc. added 295,000 more postpaid phone connections in the same period, while AT&T Inc. netted 69,000 more subscribers in that category.WSJ MembershipCustomer ServiceTools & FeaturesAdsMore
